effect:
**On Enter:**Draw seven cards.

**Inherited Effect:** Ignore the elemental requirements of basic element Slime cards you activate.
effect_raw:
On Enter:Draw seven cards.

Inherited Effect: Ignore the elemental requirements of basic element Slime cards you activate.
flavor: An aura of amiability radiates from the soul, but for some reason, it feels a bit sticky.
name: Spirit of Slime
effect_html: On Enter:Draw seven cards.Inherited Effect: Ignore the elemental requirements of basic element Slime cards you activate.

editions.effect: **On Enter:** The next Animal or Beast ally card you activate this turn enters the field with an additional **buff** counter on it.

effect: **On Enter:** The next Animal or Beast ally card you activate this turn enters the field with an additional **buff** counter on it. *(Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each **buff** counter on them.)*
effect_raw: On Enter: The next Animal or Beast ally card you activate this turn enters the field with an additional buff counter on it. (Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each buff counter on them.)
flavor: "Hey, look! Aren't my new friends cute?"
name: Silvie, Wilds Whisperer
effect_html: On Enter: The next Animal or Beast ally card you activate this turn enters the field with an additional buff counter on it. (Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each buff counter on them.)

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** Draw a card. **Class Bonus:** Up to one target non-Human ally you control gets +1 [LIFE] until end of turn. *(Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)*
effect_raw: Banish Bauble of Mending: Draw a card. Class Bonus: Up to one target non-Human ally you control gets +1 LIFE until end of turn. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Nature's grace soothes most minor injuries.
name: Bauble of Mending
effect_html: Banish Bauble of Mending: Draw a card. Class Bonus: Up to one target non-Human ally you control gets +1 until end of turn. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

effect: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.
effect_raw: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.
flavor: The easiest way to gain a beast's favor is to first look like them.
name: Beastbond Ears
effect_html: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** Target Animal or Beast ally you control gets +1 [POWER] and gains **true sight** until end of turn. *(Units with **true sight** can attack units with **stealth**.)*
effect_raw: Banish Beastbond Paws: Target Animal or Beast ally you control gets +1 POWER and gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)
flavor: A beast's ferocity and a tamer's guidance make for a formidable combination.
name: Beastbond Paws
effect_html: Banish Beastbond Paws: Target Animal or Beast ally you control gets +1 and gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** Until end of turn, Slime allies that enter the field under your control enter with an additional **buff** counter on them.
effect_raw: Banish Key Slime Pudding: Until end of turn, Slime allies that enter the field under your control enter with an additional buff counter on them.
flavor: A tasty snack enjoyed by slime but also by those adventurous enough to try it.
name: Key Slime Pudding
effect_html: Banish Key Slime Pudding: Until end of turn, Slime allies that enter the field under your control enter with an additional buff counter on them.

editions.flavor:
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk."
– Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk." — Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage

"An alchemist's impossible wish to bring his dearly departed beloved back from the other side."
— Astarte, Celestial Dawn

effect: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish CARDNAME. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"It is said a great alchemist made this amulet for his lover should she be at death's door."
— Gildas, Chronicler of Aesa
name: Life Essence Amulet
effect_html: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** The next Slime ally card you activate this turn costs 3 less to activate.
effect_raw: Banish Slime Nexus: The next Slime ally card you activate this turn costs 3 less to activate.
flavor: The heart of a slime that instills in it hopes and dreams. This gelatinous core is central to any healthy slime's biology.
name: Slime Nexus
effect_html: Banish Slime Nexus: The next Slime ally card you activate this turn costs 3 less to activate.

effect: Slime allies you control have **vigor**. *(These units wake up at the beginning of your end phase.)*
effect_raw: Slime allies you control have vigor. (These units wake up at the beginning of your end phase.)
flavor: Though it is merely a replica, the loyalty of Slime King's subjects knows no bounds, and slimes travel from across the forest just to bask in its presence.
name: Slime Totem
effect_html: Slime allies you control have vigor. (These units wake up at the beginning of your end phase.)

effect:
[Class Bonus] **On Enter:** You may banish a Slime ally you control. If you do, put an amount of refinement counters on CARDNAME equal to the banished ally's power plus 1.

[REST]**, Remove a refinement counter from CARDNAME:** Put a **buff** counter on each of up to two Slime allies you control then draw a card.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] On Enter: You may banish a Slime ally you control. If you do, put an amount of refinement counters on Verdant Scepter equal to the banished ally's power plus 1.

REST, Remove a refinement counter from Verdant Scepter: Put a buff counter on each of up to two Slime allies you control then draw a card.
name: Verdant Scepter
effect_html: Class Bonus On Enter: You may banish a Slime ally you control. If you do, put an amount of refinement counters on Verdant Scepter equal to the banished ally's power plus 1., Remove a refinement counter from Verdant Scepter: Put a buff counter on each of up to two Slime allies you control then draw a card.

effect_raw:
Intercept

On Enter: You may reveal two Slime cards from your hand and/or memory. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: A common species of slime. Though they exhibit no biologically remarkable traits, other slimes seem to naturally be drawn to them.
name: Baby Gray Slime
